abstract: Players for Canadian Women's Hockey League, which consists of only five teams, do not get paid and often have to buy their own equipment; many feel that league will be able to grow and thrive despite NHL's refusal to recognize them.
lead_paragraph: In its eighth season, the Canadian Women’s Hockey League continues to face challenges as the home for women’s professional hockey in North America.

headline.main: A League Full of Professionals, in Actions if Not in Pay
headline.print_headline: A League Full of Professionals, in Actions if Not in Pay
headline.seo: Canadian Women’s Hockey League Faces Challenges in North America

snippet: In its eighth season, the Canadian Women’s Hockey League continues to face challenges as the home for women’s professional hockey in North America.
